Tue, 27 Aug 2024 02:30:00 +0000 A report to the Hauraki District Council says grant allocations from pokies machines are unfair.
Council forces Cambridge property sale to recover rates https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/council-forces-cambridge-property-sale-to-recover-rates/NBP635SJH5EGLE3JSWSRK5XZIA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/council-forces-cambridge-property-sale-to-recover-rates/NBP635SJH5EGLE3JSWSRK5XZIA/ The council said it is the first time in almost 20 years it has had to resort this action. Tue, 27 Aug 2024 02:21:17 +0000 The ratepayer had not paid rates since 2016.

Hawke’s Bay v Canterbury: Magpies ring NPC changes, including naming Namibian Le Roux Malan on the bench https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/magpies-ring-the-changes-for-canterbury-raid/HAPBFIOJ4VC27AHPFQQKJ4X4IM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/magpies-ring-the-changes-for-canterbury-raid/HAPBFIOJ4VC27AHPFQQKJ4X4IM/ Doug LaingFrom being stretchered off in the Rugby World Cup, to getting a chance with the Bay. Photo / Photosport
Conservation land at Katikati’s Thompson’s Track a favourite spot for illegal dumping of rubbish https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/katikati-advertiser/conservation-land-at-katikatis-thompsons-track-a-favourite-spot-for-illegal-dumping-of-垃圾/VGUU6LHBBZGNHN2E5SDYQAG6VU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/katikati-advertiser/conservation-land-at-katikatis-thompsons-track-a-favourite-spot-for-illegal-dumping-of-垃圾/VGUU6LHBBZGNHN2E5SDYQAG6VU/ Rebecca MaugerFly-tippers are dumping all sorts of waste on conservation land. Tue, 27 Aug 2024 02:00:00 +0000 Among the rubbish are large items such as car parts, furniture, whiteware and TVs.
New Niwa vessel to study the sea floor in the Hauraki Gulfhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/new-niwa-vessel-to-study-the-sea-floor-in-the-hauraki-gulf/5OCSUJ4H2BHAZJBY7ZDHQDCHZM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/new-niwa-vessel-to-study-the-sea-floor-in-the-hauraki-gulf/5OCSUJ4H2BHAZJBY7ZDHQDCHZM/ Al WilliamsA Hauraki Gulf Marine Park-wide survey of this detail has not been done before. Tue, 27 Aug 2024 01:52:12 +0000 Niwa's Kaharoa II has been labelled a state-of-the-art science platform which has the capability of a larger vessel for a vast array of applications across the marine environment.
